review: The streaming with the Amazon fire stick works fairly well for Amazon Prime, Netflix, and Youtube.  However, Hulu Plus does not work well at all.  The TV screen keeps freezing the frame, while the audio portion of the program continues.  Sometimes it takes 5-6 minutes for the screen to unfreeze and the picture and audio to sink up again.  Also, in Hulu the programs keep freezing altogether and buffering every five minutes or so.  Hulu's performance with the fire stick is SO BAD that it is not worth watching using Amazon Fire Stick.  If you are a Hulu Plus watcher, you might want to try something else.  In addition, I'm not crazy for the Amazon Fire Stick remote provided with the fire stick.  The remote is extremely small and not very user friendly.

review: PLEASE DO NOT BUY! I have owned a Fire Stick for 6 months now, and can say without hesitation that it is an absolute rubbish device. The interface is horrible, it is EXTREMELY third-party unfriendly, and constantly freezes or cuts out video/audio from your media while watching. Again, please heed my warning. You will be blowing your money on a headache. It is as cheap as it is for a very good reason. You will be annoyingly redirected towards Amazon-only content, Netflix won't stream properly, nor will YouTube, and the settings are ridiculously limited. You cannot even adjust streaming resolution to play videos on a taxed bandwidth. The device is so annoying and such a waste, that I went out and purchased a Roku to replace it.
author: Unsatisfied Customer
